patterns: tell about bharathiyar university distance education
responses: The School of Distance Education, Bharathiar University is offering various courses, Further, the candidates who have completed their study under 11 + 1 / 10 + 2 / 10 + 3 (10 + Diploma) alone are eligible for any UG/Diploma courses, 11 + 1 + 3 / 10 + 2 + 3 / 10 + 3 + 3 alone are eligible for any PG/PG Diploma courses offered by SDE. more info is at click here
